-MiUniqueKey01.title: Create Five Houses for users to join
-MiUniqueKey01.description: Dive into our dynamic world, join one of five Houses, and showcase your skills. Engage in coding challenges, collaborate on innovative projects, and earn stars for your contributions and problem-solving skills. Praxis Hub is an action-oriented community of innovators and creators at the frontier of technology.

-MiUniqueKey02.title: Create Reward System for Houses to compete
-MiUniqueKey02.description: Users will earn stars for completing challenges and winning competitions.

-MiUniqueKey03.title: Track baby development through pregnancy and early years
-MiUniqueKey03.description: Users can keep track of appointments, develop a plan, and learn about baby development.

-MiUniqueKey04.title: Develop Concept
-MiUniqueKey04.description: The game environment is a futuristic colony where players need to advance a level and reach the surface.

-MiUniqueKey05.title: There are 9 levels the player needs to complete
-MiUniqueKey05.description: Each level is divided into subsections.

-MiUniqueKey06.title: There are dungeon-type monsters in each level
-MiUniqueKey06.description: The player must fight monsters to advance to the next level and collect XP.

-MiUniqueKey07.title: Uniscript players must defeat evil bunnies
-MiUniqueKey07.description: By learning JavaScript, the player helps Uniscript acquire power to defeat the evil bunnies.

-MiUniqueKey08.title: The player chooses a Uniscript avatar
-MiUniqueKey08.description: Through completing challenges, the Uniscript gains stars.

-MiUniqueKey09.title: Mini Lessons, reward system
-MiUniqueKey09.description: The lessons should be short, like a fun game, and the player will earn rewards for completing one each day.
